name: Softinn Check Availability Widget
author: Softinn

sections.description:
Softinn Check Hotel Room Availability System

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. Check Room Availability
  2. Hotel customer can book room through this system
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Go to the wp-admin/plugin-install.php
  2. Add New Plugin by searching Softinn Check Availability Widget and install
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. After activate go to wp-admin/widgets.php drag Softinn Check Availability Widget to the sidebar
sections.faq:
How this widget work?

Hotel owner need to sign up Softinn Booking in http://mysoftinn.com/
After that just need to key in your ID then the widget will let user to check hotel owner room availability
